pros: Lightweight and moisturizing, it absorbs quickly, and is easy to apply

Fragrance free, so no unpleasant sunscreen smell
cons: It does not work well for oily complexions

website_summaries.verdict: This SPF 50 sunblock provides some serious sun protection without weighing your skin down.
pros: A water resistant and oil-free option for the face and body

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and will be returning the product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the product shot shows the list of ingredients, which did NOT include phenoxyethanol. When I received the product, the packaging was different and did include this ingredient, which I was deliberately avoiding because it is toxic. Very disappointed and will be returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Delametter

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients different than listed
customer_reviews.text: We too received a tube with ingredients different than listed. I’m guessing it’s old stock. Watch out if you decide to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Left in me in a rash
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve used other group products without issue. However, I used this for sun protection over the weekend & it left a rash all over my arms & chest. Four days later it’s still lingering & I made a doctor appointment tomorrow to check it out. I used another brand (generic) of sunscreen on my legs & no issue there. I’m so disappointed because I love this brand. I didn’t get burned, it was easy to spread & it was moisturizing, but the trade off is not worth a rash. I’m not sure if it’s the selller, bad batch or what. I just wanted to write a review so others would proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Greasy on Face but Good for Rest of Body
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a daily sunscreen for my face, neck and hands, but it looks greasy on my face and burns a bit when I put it on. I have oily, acne prone skin so the added grease and irritation are not good for my face and is why I am giving it four stars. This product has all the qualities that I am looking for as far as natural, quality ingredients with a woman founder. I will continue to use this product on my body, but I am trying Elta MD for my face that was recommended by my dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: jmays2800

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a good sunscreen for daily facial use, and saw this on an IG influencer’s page. I’ve never bought a product because of an influencer, but I was in the market for this anyway, so I thought I’d give it a try. I am sold! It goes on so smoothly, and I only have to use a small amount, so the bottle will last a long time. Has a nice (subtle) scent, and actually provides a great base for my foundation. I love it. Will definitely keep buying this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby L

customer_reviews.title: Subtle pleasant scent, not greasy, high quality and effective sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. I wouldn’t wear it in the ocean because the chemicals are toxic to coral reefs—but after dealing with basal cells, I want to prevent sunburn on a daily basis and these chemicals are what the doctor ordered. This sunscreen has a really nice scent but it’s subtle, not overpowering and perfumey. It is not greasy once you rub it in. I have had no problems using it on my face. I use it as directed and it has worked perfectly. I have never been burned. It doesn’t run into my eyes if I perspire, either. It is a little pricey but I love the scent and feel like I am buying a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings

Surprisingly this sunscreen did not cause any issues - it was easy to use, smelled nice and prevented sunburn. On the other hand my 11 year old who also has super-sensitive skin broke out in a horrible rash on her face from using this - bright red super itchy/blistery rash that lasted several days and drove her nuts. So....it's kind of a gamble if you have sensitive skin - it may or may not make you break out.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cousino

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Lotion

customer_reviews.author: Ed OB

Cannot recommend this product enough.

Plus, it’s a great company!

That wouldn't have happened with a product that absorbed into my skin. I guess it worked just fine, but I will reserve this stuff for only those activities when I don't care how greasy feeling or attractive to dirt my skin gets.
